ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] More on SoV
ygData.msgSnippet: Groovey, thanks. Now the question is do I wait for x-mas KNOWING someone will get it for me, or do I buy it now.  I REALLY should wait for x-mas, since I m
ygData.messageBody:
Groovey, thanks.

Now the question is do I wait for x-mas KNOWING someone will get it for me,
or do I buy it now. I REALLY should wait for x-mas, since I'm only just
getting my two main characters to Kunark now. But the temptation...




"Mott, Mike J."
<mike.j.mott@usa.c To:
onoco.com> "'eqbards@egroups.com'"
<eqbards@egroups.com>
12/05/2000 01:49 cc:
PM Subject: RE: [eqbards]
Please respond to More on SoV
eqbards






As far as I know, the only way to get the Kunark-only upgrade is
through the Sony Online store, you can purchase the full version of EQ and
Kunark expansion together, and the Velious expansion can only be purchased
by itself.

I recall seeing a post by Absor or Abashi that the original retail
version of EQ is no longer available at all.

Lago

> Silly question, but are stores selling just the expansions, a full EQ
> including Kunark & Velious, or both?
>
>
>


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
